title: Tower of Thorns
description: Rapunzel learned her prophecy by heart years ago, and now, she plays with fate over the details.When she meets a handsome Lord at Grimm Academy, she goes one step further and starts a chain of events which will lead to a bigger betrayal than she ever saw coming.Welcome to Grimm Academy, where fairy tale characters go to avoid their fate.-Tower of Thorns is an academy retelling of Rapunzel and part of the Once Upon an Academy series, set at Grimm Academy
author: Laura Greenwood
